attributes.action: Ensure that all public street lighting is only directed downward to prevent light pollution,save energy and save our night skies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is awash with light at night due to poorly selected public (and private) lighting ,this petition is asking that at least puplic lighting channels light to the place it is needed,into the street only,allowing the use of lower power bulbs and tubes to get the same effect,reducing costs,and stopping the washing out of the night sky.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
